title: martinnura
author: martinnura
content: The developers will get a percentage of download fee when a person downloads the game from App store or Play store. The more the downloads, the higher will be the revenue earned. When the players buy or sell the NFTs on the Gaming NFT Marketplace, there will be a certain amount of transaction fee that will be charged. The developers can earn revenues from this as well. Check jump.trade

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Most nft games are based off a token that the developer may hold a preset amount of (this is normally their main profit source).Some games do charge for initial nft purchases to play games too but this isn't done on those sorts of centralised stores as they can be done in the game's marketplace - which allows people to leave the game too and sell their tokens.

comments.author: justdimin
comments.body: Quote from: martinnura on August 19, 2022, 10:32:24 AMThe developers will get a percentage of download fee when a person downloads the game from App store or Play store. The more the downloads, the higher will be the revenue earned. When the players buy or sell the NFTs on the Gaming NFT Marketplace, there will be a certain amount of transaction fee that will be charged. The developers can earn revenues from this as well. NFT itself is a great revenue generator if you are doing the right way. Which means that at first when it is minted there will be some money coming to you, secondly when we are talking about a great NFT that means people will be moving it around. I will buy, you will sell, this will create a market that is constantly changing hands and that means if you put like even a 1% tax, that could bring you a lot of money depending on how much trading happens.So at the end of the day, you do not even needs tokens or anything else, all you need is all your NFT's to be minted right away, and then constantly traded for a long time which will bring you a steady income.
